subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh continued to make atonement for any misgivings in a trying, acclimating season, finishing with a game-high 34 points as the Heat took a 2-1 series lead over the Bulls.
snippet: Chris Bosh continued to make atonement for any misgivings in a trying, acclimating season, finishing with a game-high 34 points as the Heat took a 2-1 series lead over the Bulls.
